metadata.description: Cranial nerve reflexes mediating facial protection, ocular alignment, and bulbar coordination.
metadata.notes: Captures brainstem-driven cranial reflex pathways with narrative mapping only.

jaw_jerk.stimulus: Rapid stretch of masseter muscle via chin tap.
jaw_jerk.efferent: CN V motor fibers to masseter.
jaw_jerk.effector: Quick mandibular elevation restoring bite alignment.

corneal_blink.afferent: Trigeminal ophthalmic branch to spinal trigeminal nucleus.
corneal_blink.effector: Bilateral eyelid closure protecting the cornea.

pupillary_light.effector: Sphincter pupillae contraction reducing pupil diameter.

vestibulo_ocular.stimulus: Angular head acceleration detected by semicircular canals.
vestibulo_ocular.integration: Connections to ocular motor nuclei (III, IV, VI).

gag.integration: Nucleus tractus solitarius to nucleus ambiguus.
gag.effector: Pharyngeal constriction and soft palate elevation.

facial_grimace.stimulus: Noxious facial stimuli or visceral discomfort cues.
facial_grimace.afferent: Trigeminal and visceral afferents to reticular formation.
facial_grimace.efferent: Facial nerve distribution to mimetic muscles.

tongue_protrusion.stimulus: Tactile contact on anterior tongue or oropharynx.
tongue_protrusion.afferent: Lingual nerve sensory endings to nucleus tractus solitarius.
tongue_protrusion.effector: Tongue thrust to clear airway or reposition bolus.
